command.noperms: You do not have permissions to execute this command. Required: {permission}
command.onlydev: You do not have permissions to perform this action.
command.cooldown: Stop there, you must wait `{seconds} seconds` before using the `{command}` command again!

embed.error: An error occurred while executing the command. If the problem persists contact us through [our support group.](https://discord.gg/fsJv6CB3FQ)
embed.blacklisted:
Stop there! You have been blacklisted from our bot :(
If you want more information join [our Discord.](https://discord.gg/fsJv6CB3FQ)

langembed.title: Language
langembed.desc: In this section you can change the language that you will see in the bot. You can choose between the following available languages.

changelang.same: You already have this language selected!
changelang.successfully: Language has been successfully changed to English!

dev.info: Add or remove developers from the bot, as well as see the list of them.

purge.toobig: The number must be less than 100
purge.numbernovalid: You must specify the numer of messages to delete

messages.botnopermission: I dont have the permission `BAN_MEMBERS` please contact a server administrator.
messages.noreason: but without reason, if you want to edit or add a reason, use the command `{prefix}reason #{sanctionID} new reason`
